sen.j: あやべ市民バス（あやべしみんバス）は、京都府綾部市で運行されている路線バスである。
sen.e: The Ayabe Shimin Bus is a regular route bus that is operated by Ayabe City in Kyoto pref.
The Ayabe Shimin Bus is a regular route bus that is operated by Ayabe City in Kyoto Prefecture.
The Ayabe Shimin Bus is a regular route bus that is operated by Ayabe City in Kyoto Prefecture.
The nickname is Aya Bus.
The nickname is Aya Bus.
The nickname is Aya Bus.

sen.j: 2004年1月に、会社更生法を適用された京都交通 (亀岡)舞鶴支社管内の綾部市内の路線を2005年4月に営業譲渡され成立した。
sen.e: As in January 2004 Kyoto Kotsu in Kameoka City went the Corporate Rehabilitation Law, in April 2005 Ayabe City took over the management of the bus services in Ayabe City, which had been operated by the Maizuru office of Kyoto Kotsu.

As in January 2004 Kyoto Kotsu in Kameoka City went the Corporate Rehabilitation Law, in April 2005 Ayabe City took over the management of the bus services in Ayabe City, which had been operated by the Maizuru office of Kyoto Kotsu.

As in January 2004 Kyoto Kotsu in Kameoka City went the Corporate Rehabilitation Law, in April 2005 Ayabe City took over the management of the bus services in Ayabe City, which had been operated by the Maizuru office of Kyoto Kotsu.
Now, Ayabe City manages the business.
Now, Ayabe City manages the business.
Now, Ayabe City manages the business.

sen.j: 運行は京丹タクシーに委託していたが、同社から委託解除の申し出があったため、2008年12月に丸和運輸機関グループの「関西丸和ロジスティクス」が新たな委託先となった。
sen.e: The operations of the buses were initially outsourced to Kyotan Taxi, later Kyotan filed the quitting of the operations, in December 2008 the operations were newly outsourced to Kansai Maruwa Logistics of Maruwa Unyu Kikan Co.,Ltd.

The operations of the buses were initially outsourced to Kyotan Taxi, later Kyotan filed the quitting of the operations, in December 2008 the operations were newly outsourced to Kansai Maruwa Logistics of Maruwa Unyu Kikan Co.,Ltd.

The operations of the buses were initially outsourced to Kyotan Taxi, later Kyotan filed the quitting of the operations, in December 2008 the operations were newly outsourced to Kansai Maruwa Logistics of Maruwa Unyu Kikan Co.,Ltd.
They began the operations.
They began the operations.
They began the operations.

sen.j: - 京丹タクシーから、業務委託契約解除の申し出がなされる。
sen.e: Kyotan Taxi filed the quitting the operations.
Kyotan Taxi filed the quitting the operations.
Kyotan Taxi filed the quitting the operations.

sen.j: - 綾部市が、上記解約申し出を受理。
sen.e: Ayabe City accepted the file.
Ayabe City accepted the file.
Ayabe City accepted the file.
The new operating company began the operations.
The new operating company began the operations.
The new operating company began the operations.

sen.j: 上記の歴史の記述は、いずれも、あやバス公式サイトに基づく。
sen.e: The above facts about the history are based on Aya bus official website.
sen.cmt: あやべ市民バスあやばすのページwww.city ayabe Kyoto.jp/古い記事は見られませんでした。2008年の記事については里山ネットを参照しました。www.satoyama.gr.jp/topix/2008/10/2009.html
sen.e: The above facts about the history are based on Aya bus official website.
The above facts about the history are based on Aya bus official website.

sen.j: 関西丸和ロジスティクスへの委託先変更に伴い、路線が一部変更された。
sen.e: As Kansai Maruwa Logistics took over the operations, some routes were changed.
As Kansai Maruwa Logistics took over the operations, some routes were changed.
As Kansai Maruwa Logistics took over the operations, some routes were changed.
Kanbayashi Line
Kanbayashi Route

sen.e: Kurotani-nishiyata Route
550 users a day
550 users a day
550 users a day

sen.j: 収支面では赤字であるが、当初予想していた以上の利用者となった。
sen.e: Although they are in the red, more people use the buses than the city expected.
Although they are in the red, more people use the buses than the city expected.
Although they are in the red, more people use the buses than the city expected.

sen.j: どの路線も綾部市立病院を経由しているため、市立病院から離れた地域の住民の利用が多い。
sen.e: As all the buses stop near Ayabe City Hospital, many people, which live in areas remote from city hospitals, use the buses.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: As all the buses stop near Ayabe City Hospital, many people, which live in areas remote from city hospitals, use the buses.
As all the buses stop near Ayabe City Hospital, many people, which live in areas remote from city hospitals, use the buses.

sen.j: また、京都府立綾部高等学校への通学の利用者も多い。
sen.e: Besides, many students use the buses to commute to the Kyoto Prefectural Ayabe High School.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処。
sen.e: Besides, many students use the buses to commute to the Kyoto Prefectural Ayabe High School.
Besides, many students use the buses to commute to the Kyoto Prefectural Ayabe High School.
